name: ai-tutor-app
description: AI-powered tutoring application for 6th-10th grade students

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run ml:dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../agent && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: AI Tutor Team
